## translateSpell() function

Translate magic spell in asimple manner.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function translateSpell({ spell, }: {
    spell: "Accio" | "Alohomora" | "Expecto Patronum" | "Lumos" | "Petrificus Totalus" | "Reparo" | "Wingardium Leviosa";
}): "Got you!" | "Open the door!" | "It's okay! Everything's allright!" | "Turn on the light, please!" | "Freeze!" | "Levitate!" | "Wrong spell!";
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { spell, } | { spell: "Accio" \| "Alohomora" \| "Expecto Patronum" \| "Lumos" \| "Petrificus Totalus" \| "Reparo" \| "Wingardium Leviosa"; } |  |

**Returns:**

"Got you!" \| "Open the door!" \| "It's okay! Everything's allright!" \| "Turn on the light, please!" \| "Freeze!" \| "Levitate!" \| "Wrong spell!"

The shor translation of the spell.
